Events that occurred on 1 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1896 - John Benjamin Tolkien, grandfather of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.
1917 – J.R.R. Tolkien attends an annual Minden Day Dinner at either Thirtle Bridge camp or Tunstall Hall.
1937 - Voice actor Ian Hogg is born.
1950 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 128.
1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien serves the first Mass of Robert Murray.
1962 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 240.
1967 - Actor Cameron Rhodes is born.
1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mr Burrows.
1988 - Mythcon 19 in Berkeley, California.
1993 - Mythcon 24 at University of Minnesota, Minneapolis.
1997 - The German Tolkien Society Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft e.V. is founded.
1999 - Mythcon 30 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
2004 - Mythcon 35 at University of Michigan in Ann Arbor.
2008 - Pauline Baynes, Tolkien's favourite artist, dies.
2015 - Mythcon 46 in Hotel Elegante, Colorado Springs.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
The funeral procession of king Théoden travels toward Edoras.
